# Setup Environment

**Source:** [`actions/android-setup-environment/action.yml`](https://github.com/futuredapp/.github/blob/main/.github/actions/android-setup-environment/action.yml)

Sets up Java, Gradle and Ruby and other preconditions for CI runs at Futured Android workflows.

## Usage

```yaml
- uses: futuredapp/.github/.github/actions/android-setup-environment@main
```

## Inputs

| Name | Type | Required | Default | Description |
|------|------|----------|---------|-------------|
| `java` | `string` | No | `true` | Whether to set up Java |
| `java_version` | `string` | No | `17` | Java version to use, eg. '17'. |
| `java_distribution` | `string` | No | `zulu` | Java distribution to use, eg 'zulu'. |
| `ruby` | `string` | No | `true` | Whether to set up Ruby |
| `ruby_version` | `string` | No | `3.4` | Ruby version. |
| `gradle` | `string` | No | `true` | Whether to set up Gradle |
| `gradle_cache_encryption_key` | `string` | No | â€” | Configuration cache encryption key. Leave empty if you don't need cache. |
